mapper.select: SELECT TRAVEL_DATE , SCHEDULE_START ,SCHEDULE_END ,CONTENTID ,PLACE_TYPE , STAY_TIME , TRAVEL_ORDER ,MEMO ,TITLE ,ADDRESS ,FIRSTIMAGE ,LNG ,LAT FROM DETAILINFO WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId} ORDER BY TRAVEL_DATE ASC ,TRAVEL_ORDER ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(PLAN_AREA_CODE) CODE,PLAN_TITLE TITLE,PLAN_AREA_CODE AREACODE,TO_CHAR(PLAN_START_DAY,'YYYY.MM.DD') STARTDAY,TO_CHAR(PLAN_END_DAY,'YYYY.MM.DD') ENDDAY, AREA_SHORT_NAME AREANAME, AREA_X LNG, AREA_Y LAT FROM PLAN JOIN AREA ON AREA_CODE = PLAN_AREA_CODE WHERE PLAN_ID = #{planId}

SELECT TYPE, CONTENTID ,ADD1, AREACODE, NVL(FIRSTIMAGE,'/images/icons/spot_sample.png') as FIRSTIMAGE, MAPX, MAPY, MLEVEL, TEL, TITLE FROM PLACE WHERE AREACODE=#{areaCode} AND TYPE IN (1,2,3,4) AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{findArea}||'%' AND ROWNUM <= #{maxNum} ORDER BY CONTENTID
